Text: RE FW Houston we have a problemyou call changing the world not much to do so be it I know Texas is a big state but is there enough room to accommodate your arrogance and Waldrens By the way I want to bring Dena I think its with an e something for putting up with Rich and James What kind of perfume does she like Or what else might she appreciate Give me an idea of required clothing for the evenings I assume shorts for golfing Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Mark Van Rassel Subject Re FW Houston we have a problem Im sensing that you dont have much to do during the day Im thinking about inviting Mark Waldren down at the same time Please advise

heyIve been meaning to drop you a note to say thanks for the golf weekend but things have been a little crazy since Ive been back Shannons mom passed away last Wednesday so I was on a plane to Thunder Bay within a couple of hours and up there until Sunday night It was great seeing you Dina Michael and Rich Hes a great kid Michael not Rich Please give my thanks to DIna again By the way are you missing a car key I just unpacked my golf bag and there was a key chain in the golf travel bag with a BMW key on it My intuitive mind tells me that the key is probably yours Give me your mailing address and Ill send it down to you Mark
